arts.ttl: All 12 Championship weekend games predictions - Week 13
arts.sum:
Frank Lampard's Coventry kick off the weekend schedule knowing victory at Wrexham on Friday sends them six points clear at the top of the Championship — for 24 hours at least.

That is one of 12 matches in a full weekend Championship programme and here are our thoughts on all of them.

arts.ttl: Horvath returns: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face West Brom
arts.sum: The latest Sheffield Wednesday team news as Henrik Pedersen's side gear up to face West Brom in the Championship. The post Horvath returns: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face West Brom appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: West Brom vs Sheffield Wednesday predictions: Owls’ woes to continue
arts.sum: West Brom have only managed two Championship wins since August but Elliott Bretland fancies the Baggies to take care of basement dwellers Sheffield Wednesday at the Hawthorns.
